Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 209C (Uniform Child.raw_text: Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 209C (Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act — UCCJEA), governing jurisdictional and enforcement matters for child custody proceedings.
Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 209C (Uniform Child.proposition: This Court has jurisdiction over this action pursuant to the Massachusetts Probate and Family Court's authority to modify custody and parenting time orders entered in the Commonwealth.

Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 208 (governing divor.raw_text: Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 208 (governing divorce and related ancillary matters including custody when arising from divorce actions).
Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 208 (governing divor.proposition: Under Massachusetts law, custody and parenting-time orders may be modified upon a showing of a material and substantial change in circumstances and upon a demonstration that modification is in the best interests of the child.

Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 119 (general provisi.raw_text: Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 119 (general provisions concerning children and child welfare).
Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 119 (general provisi.proposition: Under Massachusetts law, custody and parenting-time orders may be modified upon a showing of a material and substantial change in circumstances and upon a demonstration that modification is in the best interests of the child.

Mass. Prob. & Fam. Ct. Rules of Procedur.raw_text: Mass. Prob. & Fam. Ct. Rules of Procedure (applicable procedural provisions for custody modification petitions).
Mass. Prob. & Fam. Ct. Rules of Procedur.proposition: Plaintiff requests that this Complaint be served upon Defendant in accordance with the Probate and Family Court rules and that appropriate notice of hearing be provided.

Massachusetts Child Support Guidelines (.raw_text: Massachusetts Child Support Guidelines (for any support adjustments attendant to custody changes).
Massachusetts Child Support Guidelines (.proposition: D. Reserve and/or direct any adjustments to child support in accordance with the modified schedule and applicable child support statutes and guidelines;
